name: Galactic Crew
description: Galactic Crew is a roguelike sci-fi exploration game. You and your valorous crew members will explore a galaxy far away, with all its dangers and riches. Explore planets, upgrade and retrofit your ship, mine asteroids, trade with merchants, and unlock more content!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4300U CPU @ 1.90GHz Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6700 Series DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5000 MB available space
